00018 #include "phyPER.h"
00019 
00020 #include "BaseLayer.h"
00021 #include "DeciderUWBIRED.h"
00022 
00023 Define_Module(phyPER);
00024 
00025 void phyPER::initialize(int stage)
00026 {
00027   BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00028   if(stage == 0) {
00029     findHost()->subscribe(BaseLayer::catPacketSignal, this);
00030     findHost()->subscribe(DeciderUWBIRED::catUWBIRPacketSignal, this);
00031     maiPER.setName("maiPER");
00032     maiPERnoRS.setName("maiPERnoRS");
00033     nbSyncAttempts = 0;
00034     nbSyncSuccesses = 0;
00035     nbRx = 0;
00036     nbRxnoRS = 0;
00037   }
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void phyPER::receiveSignal(cComponent */*source*/, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj) {
00042     if(signalID == BaseLayer::catPacketSignal) {
00043       packet = *(static_cast<const Packet*>(obj));
00044       nbRx = static_cast<long>(packet.getNbPacketsReceived());
00045       nbRxnoRS = static_cast<long>(packet.getNbPacketsReceivedNoRS());
00046     } else if(signalID == DeciderUWBIRED::catUWBIRPacketSignal) {
00047       uwbirpacket = *(static_cast<const UWBIRPacket*>(obj));
00048       nbSyncAttempts = uwbirpacket.getNbSyncAttempts();
00049       nbSyncSuccesses = uwbirpacket.getNbSyncSuccesses();
00050     }
00051     if(nbSyncAttempts > 0) {
00052       maiPER.record( static_cast<double>(nbRx) / nbSyncAttempts );
00053       maiPERnoRS.record( static_cast<double>(nbRxnoRS) / nbSyncAttempts );
00054     }
00055 }
